name: Add new leads from Facebook Lead Ads to Monday.com as items
description: Effortlessly manage your leads with this template that connects Facebook Lead Ads and Monday.com. Every time a new lead is generated through your Facebook Lead Ads, Make will automatically create a corresponding item in your Monday.com board. This streamlined workflow ensures that you never miss a lead and can efficiently track and manage your potential customers in one centralized location. Perfect for teams looking to enhance their lead management process and improve collaboration.
